# This file is autogenerated
title: submitSwap
description: Overview of the submitSwap method
slug: wallets/reference/alchemy/wagmi-core/functions/submitSwap
---

Submit and execute a token swap using prepared calls.

This function takes prepared calls (from `prepareSwap`), signs them, and executes the
swap transaction. Returns prepared call IDs that can be used to track the execution status.

## Import

```ts
import { submitSwap } from "@alchemy/wagmi-core";
```

## Parameters

### config

`Config`

- The Wagmi config

### parameters

`SubmitSwapParameters`

- Prepared calls result from `prepareSwap` and optional connector

## Returns

`Promise<SubmitSwapReturnType>`
Promise that resolves with prepared call IDs for tracking execution status
